original_text: The ninth, for the ninth month, was Abiezer the Anathothite, a Benjamite. There were 24,000 men in his division.
korean_text: 아홉째 달 아홉째 지휘관은 베냐민 자손 아나돗 사람 아비에셀이니 그의 반에 이만 사천 명이요

sentences.original_text: The ninth, for the ninth month, was Abiezer the Anathothite,
sentences.korean_translation: 아홉째, 아홉 번째 달의, 아나돗 출신 아비에셀은,

sentences.original_text: There were 24,000 men in his division.
